ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce r Heq canonical_r.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce r Heq canonical_r.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros Q p q Hreduce r Heq canonical_r. induction Hreduce. - intros. apply Rstar_0. rewrite <- Heq. auto. - intros. apply Rstar_n with (y:=y). + auto. + apply IHHreduce. auto.
